data.content:
Done-Autorender renders a stache template on server side (SSR) as well on the client side. We use done-autorender in this example app in combination with StealJS
<script src="node_modules/steal/steal-sans-promises.js" main="steal-pwa-example/index.stache!done-autorender/no-zone">.

Done-Autorender:

  • renders the main stache template
  • inject header and body into the current page
  • handles the App-State we used for routing <can-import from="~/app" export-as="viewModel"/>
